name: 李老师不是你老师
content: October 15, Kaifeng, Henan. Sima Nan said during a live broadcast at the Kaifeng Mansion scenic spot, "Now we need thousands of Bao Zhengs. If Mr. Bao were here, he would cut the emperor to death with one blow. If the emperor breaks the law, he would be punished just like the common people. He would be executed on the spot." Then his live broadcast room was banned by the platform.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
October 11, Taiyuan, Shanxi. The shops of Zhengda International Modern Plaza were left unfinished, and some people jumped off the building to defend their rights.
October 12, Puyuan Town, Tongxiang City, Jiaxing, Zhejiang. Workers marched to demand their wages.
October 14, Luoyang, Henan. The owners of Rongshengchengyuan protested against the unfinished project.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: October 9, Shilou Town, Panyu District, Guangzhou, Guangdong. The underground garage of Asian Games City Tianfeng Community is not designed properly. The space of each parking space is very small. It is easy to scratch the chassis, roof, and tires when parking. There are only a few parking spaces available, and the owners have to find parking spaces outside the community every day. Under such circumstances, on October 9, the community property issued a notice that it would start to collect a mandatory parking fee of 400 yuan per month. This move caused dissatisfaction among the owners, and the owners gathered at the entrance of the community to protest.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 13, in Lujiang County, Hefei, Anhui, the owners of Zhongfa Century City Community held an owners' meeting because they were dissatisfied with the property management service. The property management was worried that they would be removed, so they sent people to disrupt the meeting on the grounds that they had not paid the property management fees, resulting in the meeting being unable to proceed.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On October 15 (published), the owners of Central Mansion in Huixian County, Henan Province, protested against multiple sales of one house and indefinite delays in delivery.
On October 15 (published), the owners of Panlong Huafu in Huangpi District, Wuhan, Hubei Province, protested against the unfinished project.
On October 14, Changsha, Hunan Province. Workers in the lobby of Jingtian Square demanded their wages, and the police directly threatened that protesting was illegal.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 15, Ren Zeping, a famous economist, and Dan Bin, a private equity tycoon, debated the Chinese stock market for several days, which eventually led to both of them being banned from the Internet. Dan Bin believes that after a sharp rise, there will be a sharp fall. Now that we are standing at a high position, we will not be able to get out of the trap for ten years. He also frankly said that if this rise stops and there is no sharp fall, my 32 years of experience in the industry will be in vain.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Details: More than 40 workers are demanding about HK$2 million in wages in front of the HKUST dormitory. They have been delayed in getting paid for two months. The Hong Kong Construction Industry Employees General Union posted on social media that dozens of subcontractors have been owed more than HK$2 million in wages by the general contractor, and the project payment exceeds HK$60 million. More than 60 people are involved, and about 40 of them are on site today. At the same time, the chairman of the General Union said that the world is not doing well, and many contractors have financial problems, and related incidents are expected to occur again.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 15, at about 12 noon local time, North Korea blew up part of the Gyeongui Line and the East Sea Line connecting the two Koreas, north of the military demarcation line. The General Staff of the Korean People's Army issued a statement on October 9, announcing that it would completely cut off the railways and roads connecting to South Korea from that day on, and carry out fortification and reinforcement of defense facilities. At present, the only road connecting the two Koreas is the Panmunjom Joint Security Area.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: According to a netizen’s contribution, the admissions office of the Songshan Shaolin Temple Martial Arts School claims that it can not only help children quit internet addiction and change their rebelliousness, but also correct transgenderism.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 15, a first-grade girl from Jingsheng Primary School in Lingshi County, Jinzhong, Shanxi Province cried and said she wanted to drop out of school because eight classmates bullied her. From the video, it can be seen that the little girl's mouth was full of blood. She said that the bullying classmates blocked her and prevented her from going to the teacher. In response to this matter, the staff of Lingshi County Public Security Bureau responded, "There is such a case in Jingsheng Primary School, but we are still investigating the situation."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A new model for making money from education. Recently, some netizens discovered that many QR codes appeared in some textbooks, and they had to scan and pay to "unlock new knowledge." A law textbook had 46 charging points inserted into it. If you wanted to understand the content of a charging point, you had to pay 3 yuan, a total of 138 yuan.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Follow-up to the 9-month wage arrears incident at Xinxiang Fourth People's Hospital:
On October 14, a reporter called the Xinxiang Municipal Health Commission, and the relevant staff said that the matter had been resolved and all the arrears had been paid. However, the reporter then called the hospital again, and when the reporter asked whether the wages had been paid, the other party said that the hospital was not accepting interviews for the time being.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
"Chinese Terror"
On October 10, Changsha announced the completion of the country's first "Marriage and Childbirth Culture Street"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: October 15, Guangzhou, Guangdong. The vendor was about to leave on his bike, but several urban management officers refused to let him go, causing the vendor to get furious. He pulled out a baton from his electric bike and chased after the urban management officers, shouting "I won't live any longer." One of the urban management officers was so scared that he fled.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, Zhang Zetian attended an alumni art exhibition. Because she wore an "all-seeing eye" accessory on her chest, some netizens questioned whether she had joined the organization "Illuminati". On October 16, JD.com issued a statement saying that Liu Qiangdong and Zhang Zetian were the subjects of organized rumors and smear campaigns, and that they had reported the case to the police, and the police are coordinating the investigation.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 14, after China announced the holding of the "Joint Sword-2024b" military exercise, CCTV Agriculture released a program called "Frog Farming to Prevent Escape and Disease" that day, popularizing bullfrog farming techniques, which triggered a large number of netizens. Netizens replied, "Is this the art of language?" "Remember? Red frogs are the cutest."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: North Korea's Central News Agency (KNCA) said on Wednesday that about 1.4 million young people, including students and youth league cadres, joined or returned to the army this week. The KCNA report said that these young people are determined to participate in the "sacred war to destroy the enemy with revolutionary weapons." In March last year, North Korea announced that 800,000 people had signed up to join the army to fight the United States.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: October 15, Henan. A mother with intellectual disabilities waited at the school gate for a whole morning, waiting for her child to get food after school. According to the poster, Teacher Wang, the child's father died in a car accident, and only the mother and child depended on each other at home. The original video has been deleted.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 15, a man who was going to Russia to join the army posted on Xiaohongshu that he would leave Moscow for the Ukrainian front at the end of the month. He said that the reason for joining the army was that he felt very depressed in China, so he wanted to come here to start a new life.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 14, it was revealed online that a netizen had asked a merchant on Taobao to customize a mobile phone case with a pattern of "Winnie the Pooh carrying 200 kilograms of wheat". Afterwards, the merchant's product was removed from the shelves for no reason and the netizen was banned for 2999 years.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 13, blogger "Siyou" interviewed many Russians on the street, asking them "Which country do you like best?" Most of them answered that they like Western countries the most, such as France, Sweden, Italy, Spain, etc. No one answered that they like China the most. The blogger said, "Many bloggers will shoot videos that everyone likes to watch, but the real situation is not like this. Russians almost unanimously yearn for Western countries."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 15, the Kyiv Post reported that 18 North Korean soldiers had fled the border positions in the Bryansk and Kursk regions. The reason for their escape has not yet been determined, and the Russian side has begun searching for them. At the same time, the Russian military is trying to conceal the matter from senior commanders.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: It was reported on October 16 that in his congratulatory letter to the National Committee on U.S.-China Relations' 2024 Annual Awards Dinner, Xi Jinping pointed out that China is willing to be a partner and friend of the United States, and said that China's door of opening up will only open wider and wider, bringing more opportunities for China-U.S. cooperation.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 16, the Guangzhou police reported that the street vendor was suspected of intentional injury and was taken criminal coercive measures by the police in accordance with the law.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: October 16, Kunming, Yunnan. It was revealed online that Changfeng School fed students frozen zombie meat produced in 2015, and was caught by parents on the spot. The parents said "the whole pot of meat is smelly." The Education Bureau responded that the meat has a bit of odor, and the specific situation needs to be tested, and the supplier will be stopped from delivering goods later.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: October 14, Shenyang, Liaoning. A mother asked her child, "Whose son are you?" The child replied, "I want to kill the Japanese. I am the son of the motherland."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 16, in Tan Village, Guangzhou City, Shijing Subdistrict, Baiyun District, privately demolished the village collective property "Berlin Shopping Mall Land Property" without formal approval, announcement, or villager assembly vote and signature. They also tried to organize a false supplementary procedure to supplement the vote and signature on the 16th, while at the same time endangering the demolition of the villagers' residential houses, which caused dissatisfaction among a large number of villagers. On the same day, the angry villagers went to the village committee to defend their rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: October 15, Hefei, Anhui. A woman posted a video saying that her husband died unexpectedly while working on a construction site in 2013. Four years have passed since the court ruling, but the contractor has not paid compensation. The contractor has a car and a house, so she can only take care of her three children alone and rely on the minimum living allowance to make a living.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On October 24, the German police issued a warning in German, English and Chinese, calling on young Chinese women to beware of serial rapists.
The notice said that the serial rapist was likely Chinese. His usual method of committing crimes was to purposefully hunt young Chinese women through advertisements on "Little Red Book" or "WeChat". Currently, the four victims in this case are all Chinese women
However, the domestic media avoided the nationality and methods of the perpetrator when reporting.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On October 16, the younger sister of Haitang Literature City online writer Yuan Shang Bai Yun Jian posted a post asking for help, describing how her sister was arrested for her work.
According to the Weibo post, her sister was charged with "suspected of producing and disseminating obscene materials for profit." The post said that the family was heavily in debt in order to raise money to return the stolen money. She wanted to save her sister from suffering in prison, but she had run out of ways to do so in reality, so she had no choice but to seek help online.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: October 15, Jiangxi. The woman posted that she lost her job last year, so she took the teacher recruitment exam, but she failed due to the 24-year recruitment cut. Her husband's job probation period was six months, but when the regularization date came, he was told that the company had no projects and would not make him a regular employee. This year, her husband found another job, but the job was in another place, and he was fired again three days before the regularization date. Now both husband and wife are unemployed, and both have mortgages. She said, "I'm really confused."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, in Guangzhou, Guangdong, a man found a boy picking up trash on the street. After asking, he learned that the boy was 10 years old and currently not in school. The boy said that the scars all over his body were caused by his parents beating him. The kind-hearted man treated the boy to a meal and reported the incident to the police on the roadside.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: October 15 (Released) Tianjin. An old man complained about a roadside poster promoting organ donation: "People are supreme, it sounds good, but I just want to ask where the organs come from and who they are donated to? Are they donated to ordinary people? Aren't they donated to the powerful?"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 15, the Chinese national football team defeated Indonesia 2:1 in the World Cup qualifiers, achieving their first victory in the top 18. Chinese fans at the scene shouted to Indonesian fans, "China will always be your father."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 16, in Anyue, Sichuan, two traffic policemen were attacked near Central Times Square. One of them rolled his eyes and fell in a pool of blood. An insider said: The traffic policeman was confiscating an electric bike and was stabbed in the neck. The local traffic police brigade: No life-threatening situation for the time being.
